name: SystemPackageProvider
desc: The system package providers used in this Swift package.

items.name: static func brew([String]) -> SystemPackageProvider
items.desc: Creates a system package provider with a list of installable packages for users of the HomeBrew package manager on macOS.

items.name: static func apt([String]) -> SystemPackageProvider
items.desc: Creates a system package provider with a list of installable packages for users of the apt-get package manager on Ubuntu Linux.

items.name: static func yum([String]) -> SystemPackageProvider
items.desc: Creates a system package provider with a list of installable packages for users of the yum package manager on Red Hat Enterprise Linux or CentOS.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.
